sqlMap.insert:
SELECT SVN_FILE_STATISTIC_SEQ.NEXTVAL AS VALUE FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO SVN_FILE_STATISTIC ( ID ,REPOSITORY_ID ,REVISION ,REVISION_DATE ,LAST_CHANGED_REVISION ,AUTHOR ,RELATIVE_PATH ,PARENT_DIRECTORY ,FILE_NAME ,NUMBER_OF_LINES ) VALUES ( #id# ,#repositoryId# ,#revision# ,#revisionDate# ,#lastChangedRevision# ,#author# ,#relativePath# ,#parentDirectory# ,#fileName# ,#numberLines# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT RELATIVE_PATH ,MAX( LAST_CHANGED_REVISION ) AS LAST_CHANGED_REVISION FROM SVN_FILE_STATISTIC WHERE NVL(PARENT_DIRECTORY,'/') = #parentDirectory# AND REPOSITORY_ID = #repositoryId# AND RELATIVE_PATH IS NOT NULL GROUP BY RELATIVE_PATH ORDER BY RELATIVE_PATH
